main event: A witness in Torrance, California observed a UFO on January 24, 1968, which swayed back and forth, flashing red and white lights before shooting straight up and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 60 feet wide based on the observer's arm span., The UFO traveled at a speed estimated at 1000 miles per hour., The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute., The observer noted the object made no sound and had a very bright glare., The observer's impression was that it could not have been a conventional aircraft.
sighted object: an elongated UFO swaying in the sky
witness description: The witness is male, very interested in UFOs and has observed many unidentified phenomena before.
